lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I loan because we are all connected and it is so easy.

lender.name: Chok
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping someone less fortunate make a better life for themselves and their family

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: It is the responsibility for those of us in affluent countries to give to those in need around the world; we cannot be ignorant just because we don't see them everyday.
lender.occupational_info: I read books and take tests :)

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I feel so fortunate that I can.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I loan because I am able to and by doing so hope to help make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a profession that enables me to make a difference.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I want to see others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to do their new job in our company.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I want to help others attain their goals and dreams!
lender.occupational_info: I co-own a motorcycle safety school and teach others how it's possible to ride a motorcycle safely in the city of Los Angeles!

lender.name: Antonio Alfonso
lender.loan_because: First, because I can; but also, because I love to see people with big dreams to succeed
lender.occupational_info: I forecast consumption of male products in Emerging Markets.

lender.name: Beatriz
lender.loan_because: I come from a third world country as well, if there weren't people who believed in my potential I wouldn't be where I am today financially and as a person.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the federal government.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I want to empower people to change their living situations and help to end poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who have disabilities, helping them learn how to take care of themselves and do things that typical children do. I am currently working toward teacher certification and a master's degree in education.

lender.name: Mishell
lender.loan_because: I want to support other women trying to get their businesses (and dreams!) off the ground.
lender.occupational_info: I've been a hairdresser for over 20 years; these days I work only 3 days a week and do very well for myself. I think it's essential for a woman to be self-supporting and I encourage all to work for themselves!.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I am a Christian, and I believe the we are called to help those who need help. God has done so much for me, and my hope is that through my humble service, people can learn about the wonderful God that I serve and HIs son, Jesus Christ.
lender.occupational_info: I teach boys and girls to read.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I worked in a Uganda in the 80s and it gave me much.
lender.occupational_info: I am a psychiatrist.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I believe in microcredit and entrepreneurship.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student that researches electronic properties of molecular materials.

lender.name: Vidur
lender.loan_because: I believe by making an individual financially independent, you not only help the individual but also their family & community.
lender.occupational_info: I work as software engineer at a company which make networking equipment (like routers). Lets say I play an insignificant part in connecting the whole world via the internet.

lender.name: Cherez
lender.loan_because: Purpose brings Peace

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: It seems like a great way to give someone a lift, a shot at their dreams. I've received these type of loans informally. It's good to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers, making web sites and animations, and teach math to high school students.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky and want to share that luck with others. I am hoping my investment contributes in a small way to the type of success I have enjoyed.
lender.occupational_info: President of a technology company doing business around the world

lender.name: Jamey Grant
lender.loan_because: I have seen how much just a little help can change a person's life.
lender.occupational_info: Helping good people buy nice homes.

lender.name: Armando Peralta
lender.loan_because: To help create a better world and prosperous happy lives for our global Family we are all brothers and sisters lets embrace each other with Love
lender.occupational_info: Im a recording artist musician and I touch peoples hearts with my songs and sharing inspiring all of us to experience the love the wholeness and connection to god and higher power whatever that maybe for you and that resides within all of us I love you you are a reflection of my experience and love :)

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: You get back what you give.

lender.name: Julie and friends
lender.loan_because: You are important to me. You are important to your family. You are important to your community. You are important to your country. You are important to our world. Share the gifts you are given.
lender.occupational_info: Creative musings in verse, as well as therapeutic outreach to people and animals through trauma healing practices.

lender.name: deirdre
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Affordable! Therapeutic Massage Center for the everyday person.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I would want someone to provide me with an interest-free loan if I were in need of one.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: I can feel like I am giving back, and I know that the people we are lending to will work hard to pay back our money and succeed at their business.
lender.occupational_info: I really care about people and the plight of them throughout the world.

lender.name: Blaire
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student and am very involved in my community.

lender.name: Mary & Mike
lender.loan_because: Even though I am by no means wealthy, I have the things I need. Everyone should have the means to obtain the basics.

lender.name: Clelands
lender.loan_because: It is important to remember that at any time everything can change. One moment things are perfect and a moment later nothing will ever be the same again. Take the perfect moments and share them with those who are trying so hard to find that place.

lender.name: Raquel y Martita
lender.loan_because:
We know how hard it is to get started.
Adelante!

lender.name: marco
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe that microloan could be a great opportunity for substainable development
lender.occupational_info: I'm the managing director of a small indipendent publishing house called biblioFabbrica

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I believe that I'm responsible to help those in need. I believe that with training and assistance, lives can be changed. I believe that when one life is changed it will affect a community, and communities affect the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a university to promote educational opportunities for middle and high school students.

lender.name: NDEGWA
lender.loan_because:
NDEGWA P.O BOX 290 ZIP 10300 TEL:+254 723 879600 KERUGOYA
am inteding to go on with my bee project and i request you to give me 55,000 (usd) and i will return as you stated in your web site. what are your oppinions
lender.occupational_info:
This work of beekeeping has no middle men like other businesses here in kenya.i do hope and beleave that God will help me to get enough honey to sell to oversea with me selling my product direct to the buyer this business has not been exploited unlike coffee sector were a farmer get very little and he / she is the producer of the commodity in coffee the middle men benefit most.
I encourage you people to join me in producing honey
The only thing you will need is beehives Ndegwa's slogan says, you get bees ! for free flowers for free ! nector for free ! honey for money

lender.name: LeahAndMark
lender.loan_because:
Because we are fortunate to be in a position to help others, and we believe in the power of individuals and families to find their own solutions to ending poverty. A small business loan is just one of those solutions.
We donate 10% of all earnings from our Photography Services.
lender.occupational_info: We're a couple living in Atlanta, Georgia. We take photos. Of people, families, weddings, life. We donate a portion of the fees from each photography session to Kiva.

lender.name: Masaolagi
lender.loan_because: Loan money is a helpful way to make my business better because I'm not a millionaire so i borrow money to start my business.[][][]
lender.occupational_info:
i make donut any kind of pastries i sell at school from Monday to Friday . i got $80.00 a day so which means one week is $400.00.
--

lender.name: Jaime
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I am a single mother of two and understand the challenges that come with being a parent and businessperson. I want to teach my children to think outside the box, to create ways in which to be successful while making a difference in others' lives as well.

lender.name: HOPEsudbury
lender.loan_because: After the tragic events of September 11, 2001, people in Sudbury joined together and asked, "What can we do to help?" The Sudbury Public Schools Superintendent and Town Manager called a few people to meet. Those people called a few more and HOPEsudbury was borna diverse group of residents, town employees and business peopleyoung and oldjoining together as a community to help others who might need support, encouragement and financial assistance.
lender.occupational_info: Since its establishment in 2002, HOPEsudbury (which stands for Humanitarian Outreach Project) has sponsored a variety of activities and events designed to strengthen community ties while raising money, collecting items and showing support for people in need.

lender.name: Bik
lender.loan_because: We have so much at the expense of so many.
lender.occupational_info: I am an IT manager at the University of Southampton and a Director of The Art House - a not-for-profit community art centre and vegetarian cafe in Southampton, UK

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: KIVA ROCKS!!!!

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: We all deserve a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pediatrician providing general health care to children.

lender.name: john
lender.occupation: promoter (WOW magic sing at ayala center cebu phil
lender.loan_because: i loan because i wish to have a small carenderia or small eatery for my wife.because she had a talent of cooking.she knows how to cook.she a graduate of Associate in Hotel and Restaurant Management.she can't find a job because of her height 4'11" feet.so right now she is taking care of our two children while i am working in a appliance company.my younger daughter is now 1 yr & my older son is 4yrs old which is supposedly in school right now,but my salary i not enough.because i am only earning 250 Philippine money or 5 dollars a day.so for her to have a extra income is to have our own small business.and that'smy gift for effort of taking care of us.
lender.occupational_info: my work is only to have a meal 3 times a day or less.& its not enough.compare to those businessman.I can;t find a better job because i am undergraduate in Collage.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy!

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I help high school students prepare for college entrance exams.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I build web-based databases for non-profits dealing with at-risk youth.

lender.name: Olathe Elementary
lender.loan_because: Although, our community and students are poor by American standards, it is still important for our young students to learn to help others whenever they can. They are learning that it is not hard for anyone to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: rene
lender.whereabouts: cagayan de oro city misamis oriental

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I'm grateful for what God has given me. I consider it a privilage to assist others in creating a better life for themselves and their loved ones.
lender.occupational_info: I assist my clients in establishing their goals, and setting a course of action to achieve them.

lender.name: Shary
lender.loan_because: My kids gave a present of an initial loan amount, knowing that I like to help others. Kiva is a wonderful concept, helping others that have identified ways to support themselves within their culture and specific situation. I look forward to making other loans as well!

lender.name: Wilson
lender.loan_because: I enjoy lending a helping hand and seeing other individuals succeed.

lender.name: Cat Tales
lender.loan_because: What a fantastic thing it is to be able to help someone establish their own small business.
lender.occupational_info: Environmentally-friendly housecleaner and pet sitter.

lender.name: Tom Taylor
lender.loan_because: I want to help people
lender.occupational_info: Engineering Research

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I can. And because as a working woman, I want to connect with and support other working women around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I make and design my own jewelry and other crafts in my own time and spend my work week as a university librarian.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: We all need a little help to get started, some of us with family, some with money, but all with support.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the radio broadcasting industry. We are a small company that owns 15 radio stations around the USA.

lender.name: Analisa
lender.loan_because: Everyone should be given a fair opportunity to reach their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I work in publishing, creating entertaining and educational books

lender.name: Matchbox Movement
lender.loan_because: Matchbox Movement believes in giving an opportunity to those whose circumstances may not otherwise provide one. Our fortune should not be the burden of another but rather, recognized as a tool that can create enormous change.
lender.occupational_info: Non-profit operating with the purpose of servicing those with immediate cash needs.

lender.name: Estefana & Federico
lender.loan_because: Kiva makes it hard not to.. its wonderful!

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I think that everyone has something to offer. We can succeed together.
lender.occupational_info: I am the communications director for a non profit foundation and also do freelance reporting using my home studio.

lender.name: Stacie
lender.occupational_info: Reproductive health and women's rights

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: Tikkun Olam. To heal the world.

lender.name: Clayton
lender.loan_because: every little thing counts.
lender.occupational_info: I am a social studies teacher (history/geography)

lender.name: Izabela
lender.loan_because: Those who give much receive much.

lender.name: Frank & Jen
lender.loan_because: This is a very impactful way of empowering people around the world to help themselves in a very meaningful way by investing in themselves.

lender.name: gretchen & dave
lender.loan_because: I want to be connected to the world.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to provide for my family and still have a little left over to share with others who are in need. I respect their efforts and know that it is something Jesus would do.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I think that in order for the world's economy to improve, we need to be willing to take risks and help those who are benifitial to society.

lender.name: Ben Patrick
lender.loan_because: My heart tells me to do so. I have a (very!) small foundation to help me with the tax aspects of giving, and look forward to using Kiva as well.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an announcer who sells TV shows and movies on American and global TV using my voice. I write novels, and have three published. I'm a gay and lesbian rights activist, writing blogs and creating webcasts, also serving on the board of Equality California, fighting for the rights of all Californians.

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.occupation: former GIS Analyst - now - at home mom

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: We have nothing else to depend on but each other. I'm just doing my small part.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: how could I not? The least I can do is help someone maintain their business when what they're asking for is less than my monthly rent. I sponsor a child in Peru so I guess I stick with that area for that reason.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that help facilitate the financial security of the US military and their families, while going to school to learn how to better myself to help others.

lender.name: Sonofvit
lender.loan_because: Of the high rate of return I get. Wait what? I don't get interest??? Someone remind me to read the fine print next time...
lender.occupational_info: I work in environmental consulting. I love the outdoors and am fortunate to spend at least some of my time working outside. I also believe strongly that poverty reduction is a necessary link to environmental protection.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: It's too simple to not do it.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying accounting and world food issues.

lender.name: Marty
lender.loan_because: hard working people deserve opportunities to improve their situation.
lender.occupational_info: I teach reading to special children who have difficulty learning.

lender.name: Tricia
lender.loan_because: I have been given so much and it's time to give a chance to others less fortunate who are willing to work hard to achieve.

lender.name: Bonita
lender.occupation: Supply Chain Transaction Help Desk Analyst 2

lender.name: StacyB
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are working hard to improve their lives. I prefer microlending to making donations because I can see how the funds are bring used and can loan again when the funds are repaid.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: It provides me an opportunity to assist someone I otherwise probably couldn't.

lender.name: Dorothy
lender.loan_because: I admire people who are working to make a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a geography teacher. Hopefully, I give my students an appreciation of the world around us.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping those who want to make a difference in their lives and the lives of those around them.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: Having lived in many of the countries your applicants come from, I am fully aware of their needs but also their determination and honesty.
lender.occupational_info: As a retired teacher, I now spend much time sewing, quilting and working with fabric. I loved the local fabric crafts of Africa and India where I spent many years and support these efforts wholeheartedly.

lender.name: Caci
lender.loan_because: I want to help and the stories are great. I can't wait to see how these people progress and thrive!
lender.occupational_info: I'm an account manager for a large packaging firm in the US - my customer is a major retailer, with 167 stores across America.

lender.name: Kevin Flahaut
lender.loan_because: I've been very blessed and feel like it's my obligation, even in some small way to help others who are trying to better their lives.

lender.name: Angel
lender.loan_because: I am my sister's keeper.

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance at the opportunities I take for granted.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an environmental organization that works to save the planet. It is called Greenpeace.

lender.name: Vicki
lender.loan_because: I have lived all over the world (including Uganda where I left my heart) and think that microfinance is the most amazing and direct way to impact the lives of individuals who want to better themselves and their communities.

lender.name: Beverly
lender.loan_because: There is a disparity that I can remedy in some small way. With Kiva, my small loans go a long way. I want my daughter and son to appreciate their privilege and share what we have.
lender.occupational_info: I help dying people and their families in the final weeks and days of life.

lender.name: innocent
lender.loan_because: i am presently recording an album with some street children in my country sierra leone, i am a well recorgnise musician, i strongly believe that we will make a lot of money after we finish the album.
lender.occupational_info: 80 percent of the money i make each year goes to the street children, because i my self was raised in the street, so my work presently is to raise money with my talent and the talents i found in the street children

lender.name: Fortunate Moms
lender.loan_because: It is important to all of us that we share our good fortunes as well as set an example for our children to do what we can to help improve the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: We have many different jobs but our most important role is that of mother.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: My husband and I would not be moving forward in life if not for the help and generosity others have bestowed upon us. It's time to give back to the people who need it most.
lender.occupational_info: I help people train their dogs to be well behaved.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: I want to enable people to live their life to the fullest.
lender.occupational_info: Very chaotic at times. The phones never stops ringing. The bulk of my day is spent editing and proofing legal documents. One must know legal terminology as well as real estate terms.

lender.name: Bonnie Irene
lender.loan_because: My background is in microfinance and this is a way for me to stay involved at a program-like level!
lender.occupational_info: I help nonprofits strengthen their programs so that more and better services get to those that need them.

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to help people help themselves. I don't agree with "handouts," but I very much agree with lending people a hand.
lender.occupational_info: A portion of my first paycheck went to my second loan here. I hope to continue to lend for as long as this site exists :)

lender.name: charles
lender.occupational_info: Technology

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: Such a small gift for me can have such a huge impact on someone half way around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional singer, and I teach other professional singers.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: "For I was hungry and you gave me food, I was thirsty and you gave me drink, a stranger and you welcomed me, naked and you clothed me, ill and you cared for me, in prison and you visited me." Matthew 25:35-36

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: Oak Brook, Il. United States

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: it's time for people to finance people.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: It takes a lot of courage to release the familiar and seemingly secure, to embrace the new. But there is no real security in what is no longer meaningful. There is more security in the adventurous and exciting, for in movement there is life, and in change there is power.
lender.occupational_info: I help make books.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: I like to see people who find it difficult to get money pick themselves up and run their own lives
lender.occupational_info: Finance

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: Jeannette
lender.loan_because: es gibt nichts Gutes, ausser man tut es...... People who want to start a business in order to get a better live shoud'nt get stucked because of a lack of money

lender.name: Dave and Polly
lender.loan_because: God has been good to us and I think He likes it when we share our blessings.
lender.occupational_info: Computer Scientist

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I want to help others in the world who are not as fortunate as I am here in the United States and play a small role in assisting others to be self sufficient and enjoy the pleasures of life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a television cameraman in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA. I work for a Public Broadcasting television/radio station and shoot video for documentaries, as well as various other jobs related to TV production.

lender.name: Rachael
lender.loan_because: I am addicted to what I see in potential.

lender.name: Rajib
lender.loan_because: i loan because
lender.occupational_info: I 'm SE

lender.name: Andrea
lender.occupational_info: ICT, mobile world, linux and other things

lender.name: Karim
lender.loan_because: I like to give, especially to those who appreciate what they will receive, and make good use of ot.
lender.occupational_info: At my job I design websites

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I believe we have a duty to help one another as much we can within our means. I believe this duty extends beyond race, nationality and gender and I am happy to be participating in helping to progress the future of others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Religious Studies student. At the moment I study through a distance learning course at the Open University (they are quite well known in the U.K.) and in the future I hope to have the chance to complete a post-graduate degree in a field associated with Eastern religion.

lender.name: Garner
lender.loan_because: I want to share the gifts I've been given in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I fly people around in airplanes

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I believe a small helping hand can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the implementation of systems, applications, and services for large corporations.

lender.name: Katie M.
lender.loan_because: it really can change lives.

lender.name: Justin & Casee
lender.occupational_info: We are both currently students at The University of Tennessee. Casee is a English major and Justin is a Finance major.

lender.name: Zak
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: You just have to love the human side of capitalism
lender.occupational_info: I design wind turbines

lender.name: Tami
lender.loan_because: While traveling in Cambodia, my partner and I had the chance to help a family have a well dug for their home; they only had access to rice paddy water. The well was dug in just a few days and we got to see the family use it before we returned home. It was so gratifying to see how a little money made a big difference to the lives of this farming family. Kiva lets me continue to make a small difference in the lives of other families who need a helping hand.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: helping others isn't an option.

lender.name: Dirk
lender.loan_because: It`s fascinating to get in touch with other people in other parts of the world. And they are Your business partners more or less, they are no beggars ! I hope this makes them feel proud.
lender.occupational_info: Organizing railway operation and especially railway construction work fr Deutsche Bahn (German Railway Company).

lender.name: Race & Brianne
lender.loan_because: We want to spread our Aloha onto others.

lender.name: Greg
lender.occupational_info: I live in New Haven, Connecticut where I work in the Yale University Library as the librarian for U.S. history and American Studies (which means that I purchase history-related materials for the library). A U.S. citizen by birth, my background is (Malaysian) Chinese and Irish. Through my travels and reading I have developed a special affection for Mexico and Mexican culture.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Kumud
lender.loan_because: it can make a difference to someone's life.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance is the most brilliant innovation in charity since charity. That someone can dedicate as little as $25 of their wealth to allow it to help endless amounts of people is truly revolutionary.
lender.occupational_info: I study political science at Temple University in Philadelphia and write for various publications at my school and in the city. And every country has school and writing, so little explanation is needed.

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: I applaud the entrepreneurial spirit, and delight in helping others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info:
I teach classes and write books to help adults learn and become more productive with engineering software. I also assist non-profit groups and indigenous people in learning to use GPS, mapping and surveying technology to better manage their spatial data and land use.
I am a geographer - I love international travel, meeting terrific people and documenting my journeys through art, photography and writing.
The fellow at left is not me, 'tis Samuel Clemens (aka Mark Twain - one of my favorite authors), observing a dramatic demonstration in the laboratory of Nikola Tesla, an entrepreneur whose ideas utterly eclipsed those of Edison, Bell and Ford combined.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: Because I believe individuals should help individuals. This site helps people who want learn "to fish".
lender.occupational_info: I go to university and I work in a Museum.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: This organization makes it so easy to help others!
lender.occupational_info: Professor

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: I should.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: When I realize how fortunate I am and how little it takes to really help someone change their life it's hard not to loan through Kiva. By helping one person improve their life we can impact many people around them, not just family, but others in the community as well. I prefer loaning to women since they are the ones that bring up the children - helping women thrive encourages the next generation to strive for a better future as well. I tend to help those who farm, do hand crafts or work with textiles because I enjoy doing those things myself.

lender.name: Joe & Simone
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are survivors, not lucky enought to have been born in a land of abundance. I'm also trying to teach my daughter what it means to help and how to improve this bizarre planet.
lender.occupational_info: I work for lawyers who represent people in legal disputes or who the government has accused of committing a crime. Simone is 5 years old and likes to grow vegetables and herbs.

lender.name: Nate
lender.occupational_info: Student in my first year of medical school. My wife Amelia is a high school English teacher.

lender.name: Julene
lender.loan_because: I love to travel and want to improve the world we live in.
lender.occupational_info: Working with people in an organization to improve their skills in leadership, project management and teamwork. Improving the business with the coordination of people.

lender.name: The B-C Family
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed throughout our lives and want to extent those same blessings on to other families around the world.

lender.name: LUIS
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and it's time to help.
lender.occupational_info: Sell real estate in Los Angeles

lender.name: leslie, allen, & boys
lender.loan_because: I believe in changing the world one person/family at a time. I want to raise my sons do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I spend my days taking care of my three little boys. At night I paint and sell my work on the internet. My husband is an engineer, he builds things.

lender.name: Merle
lender.loan_because: As a retired banker I know credit can change individual lives, families and communities.

lender.name: HUM 455 - Spring 2008
lender.loan_because: We want to put what we are learning in class into practice in the real world.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I can afford to, the first two loans were a gift to my mom for mother's day
lender.occupational_info: University student studying land use planning in Wisconsin

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I want to help people all around the world to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college students history and current events and issues, and, as director of an Honors Program/College, I help motivated students to be the best that they can be and accomplish as much as they can.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: It should be our responsibility to help eachother reguardless of ethnicity, gender or geography. I want to help others especially who are pro-active in helping themselves, their families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Pathology lab at a University hospital were I dissect surgical specimens, preform post mortem exams and help train medical students.

lender.name: Rachael
lender.loan_because: I LEND because friends lent money to me years ago and it made all the difference in my life. I am lucky, I work hard, and I never forget the importance of the circle of giving and receiving.
lender.occupational_info: I own and run three guesthouses, little hotels in the city. I have about 30 people working for me. Most of them, and many of my guests come from foreign lands. While my work does not allow me to travel, it gives me the privilege of meeting and getting to know people from everywhere.

lender.name: Dana & Kimberlea
lender.loan_because: We are called of God to spend ourselves on behalf of others, to loose the chains of injustice.
lender.occupational_info: We provide a haven of safety for abandoned and neglected children.

lender.name: Toni
lender.loan_because: by many standards I may not have much, but I am blessed with what I do have. If we aren't here to help others, what are we here for?
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate a courthouse facility that handles criminal cases for kids under the age of 18 years.

lender.name: Stephen and Erika
lender.loan_because: We own two businesses and sometimes folks need to reach out to help your business grow. Our family has been fortunate to have a terrific customer base, We want to see other folks in our world succeed in their own business venture by sharing the fruit of our success.
lender.occupational_info: We own a summer day camp for children - in the summer months when school is not in session they come to our property and play, swim, boat. During the school year we operate our construction and home repair business.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: The world has loaned so much to me for the brief time I am here on the planet......
lender.occupational_info: I have the opportunity to listen to people as they share personal life stories, including the good and the diifficult details,The sharing with another neutral person, seems to assist in working through life's many traumas. It is incredible to be a small part so many lives.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I have so much. They have so little.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I want to help. I like donating money but I think lending money will help me spend my money wiser. I am not a rich person, but I have money to share, and if I loan the money and get it back, that can maximise the amount of money I have to share.
lender.occupational_info: I work with multiply disabled children and I love having the opportunity to smile and laugh with them everyday! :)

lender.name: CATHERINE
lender.loan_because: Hola, mi edad es de 24 tengo una nena de 3 .Necesito trabajar para poder salir adelante.Doy el servicio de manicura, pedicura y unas de acrilico pero no he podido habilitar un salon para dar todo el servicio de bellea como cortes , tintes etc.Ya q mi situacion economica no me lo ha permitido.He visitado varios lugares para ver un prestamo y asi empezar a trabajar pero en ningun lado me lo dan porque no puedo comprobar ingresos.Ojala aqui si se pueda.Esto seria un gran empujon para que salga adelante y para devolverlo, muchas gracias.
lender.occupational_info: Como algo noble, que hace q la mujer se sienta mas bella de lo q es.Al igual q los hombres.

lender.name: John Rynne
lender.loan_because: I believe that a lot of small contributions can make a huge difference in ordinary people's lives, helping small businesses get off the ground.
lender.occupational_info: I translate written texts (mainly financial documents) from Spanish into English.

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: I want to give back some of the good that has come my way.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a continuing care centre as a Food Service Aide.

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good helping entrepreneurs rise to their potential. Capital is a tool every bit as necessary to an entrepreneur as a hammer is to a carpenter.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a company where I help make cool mobile phones

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I Can
lender.occupational_info: I fly airplanes

lender.name: killu
lender.loan_because: We have benefited from being given chances, and would like to give back - what is a small, ordinary contirbution to us may turn into something extraordinary for others, just as has happened to us in years past. We would also like to teach our children to become conscientious citizens of the world, to help people help themselves, and to nurture entrepreneurial spirit by watching real life successes and failures. Kiva is good for the soul of the giver and the receiver.
lender.occupational_info: We work in the field of biotechnology aimed at developing new medical breakthroughs in treatment and prevention of disease.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: Every one should have the opportunity to be in control of their own destiny. I believe this is definately one way to take control.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get a fair trial when they are accused of a crime.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: It makes the money I set aside to help others go further.

lender.name: Darla
lender.loan_because: I can connect with the world in my own small way and help others who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work in software sales.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: Why not use some extra dollars to make life a little easier for someone? I'd like to make a contribution, no matter how small.

lender.name: Lolo
lender.loan_because: I am deeply impressed and affected by the ingenuity of this effort and of the people it touches.
lender.occupational_info: Since 1983, I haved worked as a registered nurse, caring for tiny or sick babies from all over Alaska. I love what I do and am so fortunate to work with an amazing group of people. I am also a proud member of "Kiva Nurses", an awesome lending group with caring people from throughout the world.

lender.name: ange
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together :-)

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: I believe making the world a better place can happen one small step at a time.

lender.name: DENNY
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I wanted to support it because I wanted to support my friend Brooke, and also because I think the idea itself is very good, and I am in a position to benefit these people so wanted to do my bit, although I'm not limiting myself just to this.

lender.name: Gwendolyn
lender.loan_because: I have a small retail mobile reloading business and I want to expand it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother of 5 kids and my husband is working as a customer service representative. I am selling/retailing mobile loads to help my husband to support our big family and for an additional income for our daily sustainance . 4 of kids are in school and my husband's income is enough to support my children's education and daily needs. I want to have a stall for my business so I can easily be reach by my customers since I am only based at home

lender.name: The Stong Family
lender.loan_because: We like helping fellow entrepreneurs and know how valuable a helping hand can be. Especially in the early going.
lender.occupational_info: We sell gifts on the internet.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: give other people a chance at a better life
lender.occupational_info: work in finance for the Education Dept.

lender.name: ritchell
lender.loan_because: i want to have a small business to finance our daily needs.and if will be successful on it i wanted to enroll my younger sisiter in college because she havent been in school for 2 years.the moment she finished her highschool.
lender.occupational_info: actually iwas working as a contractual,after 6 months my contract has ended ,and for now im still looking for job,thats why while i still look for another one,i wanted to try a small business.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I recently visited Kenya and found a desperate need for aid in the medical field.

lender.name: Robert & Brigitt
lender.loan_because: We believe in small family and group enterprises as key players in economic and social development. Our personal sympathy is for Southeast Asia.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I think it is the best way to help individuals and communities while allowing people to maintain their independence. Its contractual, accountable and effective.
lender.occupational_info: I work in sales and marketing

lender.name: andrei
lender.occupational_info: bathing myself in capitalism

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I do development work for social ventures and charities

lender.name: cindy & jorge
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of one. One can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: My husband (from Mexico) and I work 7 days a week in our own business, a small motel in a rural area. Additionally, I work part-time in my own bookkeeping/tax preparation service.

lender.name: Frdric Sennhauser
lender.loan_because: "When it's a question of money, everybody is of the same religion" -Voltaire
lender.occupational_info: Responsible for SHARK Energy Drink in Spain, Portugal, Andorra and Gibraltar.

lender.name: Kerr Cuhulain
lender.loan_because: Founder of the Order of Scathach, a Wiccan order of Knighthood. We want to help people in other parts of the world to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Kerr is a retired police officer now working as a police dispatcher. Other members of our Scathach group are army officers, private investigators, musicians, and office managers.

lender.name: Dorota
lender.loan_because: I would like to help poor people in the world to became self-independent.
lender.occupational_info: I am an architect and volunteer

lender.name: Janis
lender.loan_because: small changes can make a big difference

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I too at one point in my life was a single mother trying to raise 2 children and could have used help then today i want to give back to other women in this same place.
lender.occupational_info: I am a painter and creative multi media artist

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: It works!
lender.occupational_info:
Since 1973 I've made my living designing, crafting and selling metal sculpture for homes and offices.
Putting this experience to work I now produce instructional videos for people who want to do what I do.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have and be able to give to those who do not have, a chance of earning a living, respectably, without taking charity.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have most of what I need and I know there are others that just need a chance to make their lives better
lender.occupational_info: I work as a nurse in surgery

lender.name: St
lender.loan_because: I've been given opportunities in life and I want to help others who haven't been as fortunate but are trying to make things better.

lender.name: TAEEUN
lender.loan_because: I am intereted in development finance for helping developing countries. I think that what kiva wants to do is the best and most effective way to help them.
lender.occupational_info: I am from South Korea but now I am studying law in the U.S. I am interested in human right and international financial law. I am always thankful what I've got and want to share them for other people.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: My lovely daughter started me with a Mother's Day gift certificate. She's been donating for a while and has seen great results.
lender.occupational_info: I own a graphic design/marketing business. I work from my home office so I'm also home for my two younger sons and my dog. It's been very empowering to have my own business and I love the idea of helping others start their business.

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and I respect people who try to succeed. I like to help them do so in countries where survival, never mind success, is so difficult.
lender.occupational_info: I write books. I work with computers to make pictures and words into something that helps businesses grow. I am a storyteller.

lender.name: Deana
lender.loan_because: My goal in life is to help as many people as I can, whenever I can. As a college student that can be hard at times, but I always do what I can.

lender.name: salvador
lender.loan_because: i know i'm making a diffrence in these people life's.

lender.name: cory
lender.loan_because: We are a global community and should help each other develop ideas and achieve dreams
lender.occupational_info: I study the earth.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I have lived in Togo and visited southern Ghana -- I have a great deal of respect for the hard working people of this area.
lender.occupational_info: As a professor of English rhetoric in California high schools and colleges, I tried to inspire students to learn about the rest of the world, and to appreciate their many blessings. It's important not to take education for granted, and to work hard to develop literacy in as many languages as possible.

lender.name: Leila
lender.loan_because: I've been lucky enough to have been able to start my own business and I'd like to help others have the same opportunity.
lender.occupational_info:
I'm a photographer, specializing in modern boudoir.
Other than that, I'm a mother and a wife. I'm very active in our Unitarian church. My family and I just brought our 5 year old son home from Ethiopia and, let me tell you, nothing's been the same since!!!
My dream is to win the lottery so that I could give almost all of the money away to charities. =)

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: My compassionate son gave me a Kiva certificate Mother's Day gift, to help make the world a better place.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great program, I'm glad to be able to help.

lender.name: linda karana
lender.loan_because: i feel very fortunate to have the funds to share with others who are working to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: i am a healer and a writer, living each day to "be the change".

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I like giving and helping people with their businesses. I get a kiva gift card for Christmas every year.
lender.occupational_info: I'm 12years old and my work is school.

lender.name: Catie
lender.loan_because: I'm helping others
lender.occupational_info: I learn

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed buy God and he has called to be a blessing.

lender.name: mihkel
lender.loan_because: If everyone contributes a little, it can turn into something really big, and that is one way to change the world for the better
lender.occupational_info: My job is to make sure the accounting and financing of my company is working the way it should

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: It helps the world, and i thought it was a brilliant idea.

lender.name: terri
lender.loan_because: gift from my oldest son

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: Traditional means of human advancement have proven to be a failure for the most part. The idea of loaning money in this way seems promising.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student online. I'm studying to become a computer technician.

lender.name: Roberta Rosenberg
lender.loan_because: for every gift I get, it's important to give one back.
lender.occupational_info: I help to make other business owners successful.

lender.name: Cassie
lender.loan_because: I believe this sort of empowerment not only creates leaders, but it also creates lasting change
lender.occupational_info: I am a substitute teacher and work at an airline--but my real work right now is planning to volunteer back in West Africa

lender.name: Carol From Tucson, AZ
lender.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune with those less fortunate. God has blessed me and I should share those blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: Volunteer for African refugees in America.

lender.name: Kelsey
lender.loan_because: We have to look out for each other.
lender.occupational_info: Learning every day, and seeing the sights along the way.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I think it is great to be able to help others across the world improve their and their family's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a PhD student in political science at Washington University in St. Louis, Missouri.

lender.name: Vince
lender.loan_because: I see Kiva as a great opportunity to help many individuals around the world help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a travel company that provides tours for Senior (older than age 50) Americans to go overseas and truly experience local cultures.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: What's not to like?? This is a wonderful program and a great opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and study Spanish, help friends, work at the Humane Society, the St. Vincent de Paul Society, care for my family and home, do yoga, travel, enjoy a priviledged retirement.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others. We all need a hand sometime.

lender.name: Agnieszka
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people who deserve to be helped. Our my family was helped many years ago by virtual strangers and this is the way I repay our debt since now we can do it.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people helping them to manage money so that is lasts for them for a long time.

lender.name: Darryl & Sue
lender.loan_because: Our Grandson was born in September 2010, We hope this, in a small way makes the world a better place for our grandson to grow up in. When he's old enough to understand, we'll explain to him the value of assisting those in the world who don't have the opportunities that life has given us in Canada.

lender.name: Sarita
lender.loan_because: I am able to choose who I help and the borrower is able to choose the help they seek. Kiva offers a link between us that makes sense to me.
lender.occupational_info: I trade international currency and stock.

lender.name: Reetash and Cinda
lender.loan_because: Its good to spread the love and abundance. To all you lenders out there and the Kiva staff "You Rock".
lender.occupational_info: We work and run a home business part time.

lender.name: Linda
lender.occupational_info: I do tuberculosis and HIV care

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I

lender.name: Ivy
lender.loan_because: it makes sense to help people become self-sufficient and self-sustaining. People who are blessed are responsible to help the social good.
lender.occupational_info: helping children and families who have experienced a hardship heal.

lender.name: Kashif
lender.loan_because: trying to do my small part to give back.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: this is the greatest opportunity to lend with warm hands to someone who really really needs help, and take a step up and out
lender.occupational_info: medical professional doing Q&A full time for a national company, Artist in all mediums is my joy and release, entrepreneur and marketer for my art and health products

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: as my toddler says "sharing is caring". A simple sentiment, but at all levels, he is right.

lender.name: Friesen-Beardsell clan
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference in the world.

lender.name: TDL
lender.loan_because: It would have been a really tough road for me without the help I received, so I know a little help goes a long way...

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I am a world traveler -- every chance I get! -- and am thrilled to find ways to really make a difference and help individual people directly.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the NYC public schools with SpEd teenagers, helping them develop job skills and teaching them about the real world. My class has continuously helped choose Kiva loans!

lender.name: unnamed
lender.loan_because: a poor carpenter keeps on lending me.

lender.name: Masakatsu
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have an opportunity to succeed and I would like to help people make a difference in their life.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently working as an engineer who develops a key electronic device called image sensor used in product such as digital still cameras and video cameras.

lender.name: Maree
lender.loan_because: it is a fantastic opportunity to assist someone to get ahead and have a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people with a disability and help give them good services and have the very best life they can.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: I believe that entrepreneurship and innovation can bring the wealth of the human race up across the board. Together, we can eliminate poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a partner in a company that provides services to individuals and other small companies that own and operate business aircraft. We buy and sell aircraft, provide pilot training, and perform technical inspections on aircraft.

lender.name: Sayce
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: i was given $20 and instructed to change the world, so i added 5 of my own, and that's what i intend to do.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need. It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I have a small manufacturing firm. We employ 15 people

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I wanted to participate in creating a little happiness, and I believe in the golden rule.
lender.occupational_info: I purchase items that my company requires to do business. I hope my loans enable others to do the same!

lender.name: Claartje
lender.loan_because: Its really good when you can help other people making there dreams come true. The nicest thing in live is when you are in the position you can help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I am social worker at primary schools in Amsterdam.

lender.name: globalista
lender.loan_because: Communicate, educate, reduce, reuse, recycle!

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I've been given a fantastic opportunity, it's the right thing to do and... it makes me feel good!
lender.occupational_info: Enjoyable
